DBQuery.SQL: select Name, DBVersionNumber, InstallDT, Comment from ( select top 1 'CDR' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_CDR_CC.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'CDR' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_CDR_Community.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'CDR' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_CDR_CTY.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'CDR' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_CDR_LC.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'IdentityResolution' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_IdentityResolution.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select 'JADR' Name,'NA' DBVersionNumber, 'NA' InstallDT, 'NA' Comment, '' DBVersionID, '' BuildURL, '' BuildRev, '' UserName --select 'JADR' 'Name', * from ZGEN_QA743_JADR.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'MediLog' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_MediLog.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'MPI' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_MPI.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'NexusEngine' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_NexusEngine.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'PAD' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_PAD.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select 'PatientReferral' Name,'NA' DBVersionNumber, 'NA' InstallDT, 'NA' Comment, '' DBVersionID, '' BuildURL, '' BuildRev, '' UserName --select * from (select top 1 'PatientReferral' 'Name', * from ZGEN_QA743_PatientReferral.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc) s union select top 1 'Registry' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_Registry.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'Reporting' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_Reporting.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'RMI' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_RMI.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc union select top 1 'Worklists' Name, * from ZGEN_QA743_Worklists.dbo.DBVersion order by DBVersionID desc ) s
select distinct Name, FileVersion from Assemblies a inner join Instances i on a.AssemblyID = i.AssemblyID where a.Deleted = 0
